sentences.en: They don't let you know that it'll become a test of discipline.
sentences.zh: 他们不会告诉你，这是一场自律的考验。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðeɪ doʊnt lɛt ju noʊ ðæt ˈɪtəl bɪˈkʌm ə tɛst əv ˈdɪsəplɪn/

sentences.en: Being able to keep it clean, keep food on your own table and pay for the roof over your head are direct reflections of who you become as a person.
sentences.zh: 能否保持整洁、保证有饭吃、支付头顶的房租，都直接反映了你是一个什么样的人。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ˈbiɪŋ ˈeɪbəl tə kip ɪt klin, kip fud ɑn jʊər oʊn ˈteɪbəl ænd peɪ fɔr ðə ruf ˈoʊvər jʊər hɛd ɑr dɪˈrɛkt rɪˈflɛkʃənz əv hu ju bɪˈkʌm æz ə ˈpɜrsən/

highlight_entries.display_text: keep food on your own table
pay for the roof over your head

sentences.en: They don't tell you that you become your own person.
sentences.zh: 他们不会告诉你，你会成为独立的个体。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðeɪ doʊnt tɛl ju ðæt ju bɪˈkʌm jʊər oʊn ˈpɜrsən/

sentences.en: You don't rely on anyone ever.
And if something needs to be done, you'll do it.
sentences.phonetic_us: /ænd ɪf ˈsʌmθɪŋ nidz tə bi dʌn, jul du ɪt/

sentences.en: They don't tell you how many new hobbies you might try out, like reading, meditating, juggling, acrobatics, and even cooking it.
sentences.zh: 他们不会告诉你，你会尝试多少新爱好——读书、冥想、杂耍、杂技，甚至烹饪。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðeɪ doʊnt tɛl ju haʊ ˈmɛni nu ˈhɑbiz ju maɪt traɪ aʊt, laɪk ˈridɪŋ, ˈmɛdɪˌteɪtɪŋ, ˈdʒʌɡəlɪŋ, ˌækrəˈbætɪks, ænd ˈivɪn ˈkʊkɪŋ ɪt/

sentences.en: They don't tell you that your home becomes a safe place for the ones you love.
sentences.zh: 他们不会告诉你，你的家将成为所爱之人的避风港。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ðeɪ doʊnt tɛl ju ðæt jʊər hoʊm bɪˈkʌmz ə seɪf pleɪs fɔr ðə wʌnz ju lʌv/

sentences.en: Your arms are always open for people.
sentences.zh: 你的臂膀永远为他人敞开。
sentences.phonetic_us: /jʊər ɑrmz ɑr ˈɔlˌweɪz ˈoʊpən fɔr ˈpipəl/

sentences.en: Once you live alone, they don't tell you that while there's a whole lot of upsides, there are plenty of downsides that come right with it, but that never means not to move out.
sentences.zh: 当你真正独居时，他们不会告诉你：尽管好处数不胜数，随之而来的坏处同样层出不穷——但这不是不搬出去的理由。
sentences.phonetic_us: /wʌns ju lɪv əˈloʊn, ðeɪ doʊnt tɛl ju ðæt waɪl ðɛrz ə hoʊl lɑt əv ˈʌpˌsaɪdz, ðɛr ɑr ˈplɛnti əv ˈdaʊnˌsaɪdz ðæt kʌm raɪt wɪð ɪt, bʌt ðæt ˈnɛvər minz nɑt tə muv aʊt/

sentences.en: If you should, you'll become a better version of yourself within days.
sentences.zh: 如果你这么做，你会在一段时间内就成长为更优秀的自己。
sentences.phonetic_us: /ɪf ju ʃʊd, jul bɪˈkʌm ə ˈbɛtər ˈvɜrʒən əv jʊərˈsɛlf wɪˈðɪn deɪz/
